desc: We roast coffees in 9 pound or smaller batches to ensure quality & consistency for the best tasting cup of coffee. Order on line, stop by the cafe, roasting studio, or find in a Vermont store near you. A strong focus on ethical and ecoconscious business practices is at the core of Flying Crow Coffee Co.

layout.text: Subscribe Today to Get Your Favorite Coffees Shipped to you Automatically!!!

It's a great time to start a subscription service and get the coffee you love shipped straight to your door at the frequency you need to never run out. We offer a weekly, fortnightly (every two weeks), and monthly plan to meet your needed. Subscribers get free shipping on shipments of 2 pound or more.
So come on and Join the Murder today!
